Ripe.obtainment:
Rare chance to replace the normal variant.
Can stack with Gold or Rainbow.
Only applies to Sugar Apples.
Ripe.description: Purple in color, fading darker towards the bottom

Gold.obtainment:
1% chance to grow replacing normal variant.
Can be applied by Dragonfly pet.

Rainbow.obtainment:
0.1% chance to grow replacing normal variant.
Applied by Butterfly pet on crop with 5+ mutations (removes all previous mutations).
Rainbow.description:
Continuously changes color
Emits yellow particles and rainbow above it

Wet.obtainment:
During Rain or Thunderstorm.
Chance from sprinklers.
Applied by Sea Turtle.
Admin event: Under The Sea.

Windstruck.description: Wind gusts swoop around the crop

Moonlit.obtainment: During Night, max 6 plants moonlit every 2 mins.
Moonlit.description:
Glowing purple aroma
Purple in color

Chilled.obtainment:
During Frost.
Applied by Polar Bear or Mutation Spray: Chilled.

Bloodlit.obtainment: During Blood Moon (replaces Night every 4 hours).

Drenched.description: Large water droplets fall from the crop

Frozen.obtainment:
If crop has both Wet and Chilled.
Applied by Polar Bear or Flower Froster Sprinkler (flowers only).

Aurora.description:
Pulses between blues & purples
Releases faint smoke above

Shocked.obtainment:
Crop struck during Thunderstorm or Jandel Storm.
Applied with Mutation Spray: Shocked.

Celestial.description:
Slightly reflectant
Sparkling yellow and purple
